 Occ: ok he never hit on Kit Kat infront of drillbit.
Amd also he only knew you during your engagement.

   Destructor sent another comm:"I wish to join your
ranks once again. I have some important news
concerning the fate of the predacons...and this" he
held out the third golden disc.
--- RoboRick007 <rfa007@...> wrote:
> ::DrillBit::
> 
> The comm from Destructor came over the comm
> channels.
> 'Destructor! Alive!', he thought. He opened a
> commlink.
> "Welcome back, Destructor..."
> DrillBit really wasn't happy. He didn't much like
> Destructor. Mostly
> because he always hit on KitKat. Even after they
> were ingaged to be wed.
> And he was an arrogent jerk.
>
